25527704, 25528847, 25527744], score=252, time=1608791128, title='Ask HN: What Lived Up to the Hype?', item_type='story', url=None, parent=None, text='Cyberpunk’s reviews paint it as a tire fire. I think it’s a fun game, but it doesn’t live up to the expectation - it’s not the next Witcher 3.<p>There are many examples of overhyped releases: Duke Nukem Forever, the Matrix sequels, etc. What got hyped and actually delivered?')
